definitions.definition: The ecosystem of the Earth regarded as a self-regulating superorganism .
A Greek goddess , the personification of the earth , and one of the primordial deities from whom all the others descend .

main_definition: ( ecology ) The ecosystem of the Earth regarded as a self-regulating superorganism . [from 20th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( Greek mythology ) A Greek goddess , the personification of the earth , and one of the primordial deities from whom all the others descend .
